jd: From: Sweety, Source InfoTech Inc sweety@sourceinfotech.com Reply to: sweety@sourceinfotech.com Hi,Hope you all are doing well,Please find the job description below,Job Title: Java Developer Node JS/AWS developerLocation: RemoteDuration: 4+ monthsEx capital one contractors onlyMust have skills (ALL MUST)Node JS JavaScript React AWS (ECS, Lambda S3, RDS, CloudWatch)- ALL MUSTElastic search Project This is for Bank tech line of business & for an internal knowledge management customer service app that helps 10000 + customer agents to help customers with various queries .This app is part of the pilot program which will use AI to help agent answers all the questions for customers .There are 5 members in the team and 1 of the team member is moving to another project so they are backfilling the position .The day to day responsibilities looks like supporting the app , work on elastic search functionality .The project is already existing & this role will involve both development & production support work . Thanks,SweetyIT RecruiterSource InfoTech Inc.,Email: sweety@sourceinfotech.com Disclaimer: If you are not interested in receiving our e-mails then please reply with a "REMOVE" in the subject line at remove@sourceinfotech.com for automatic removal. And mention all the e-mail addresses to be removed with any e-mail addresses, which might be diverting the e-mails to you. We are sorry for the inconvenience
